plot: As boy, Emmerich Kalman feels more at home in the country with gypsy musicians then in his stuffy family. His soulless uncle puts him to college, but disapproves of music even as a hobby, ...
title: Der Czardas-König
plot_es: As boy, Emmerich Kalman feels more at home in the country with gypsy musicians then in his stuffy family. His soulless uncle puts him to college, but disapproves of music even as a hobby, ...
